name: Centre for Information and Guidance India (CIGI)
briefDescription: A Voluntary Non-Profit Organization That Works All Days To Support Students And Youngsters In Their Career Planning And Skill Development.  It Also Focuses On Quality Improvement Of Teachers / Parents.  CIGI Has A Proud Track Record Of Serving Over A Million Beneficiaries Annually Through Its Zonal Offices And Teamwork Of Resource Persons And Voluntary Organizations.
